1.description: 3-tier architecture with Repository, Service Layer, and DTO patterns. Implemented JWT authentication with Spring Security, 3 amortization systems (Personal, French, German), real-time KPI dashboard using Chart.js, and document storage with MinIO. Challenge: Managing complex financial calculations. Lesson: Importance of separation of concerns.

2.description: Desktop application with Swing UI and FlatLaf Darcula theme. Complete CRUD with unique membership validation. Spring Data JPA integration for persistence. Challenge: Synchronizing UI state with database. Lesson: Benefits of using ORM vs pure JDBC for maintainability.

3.description: Bidirectional communication with Spring WebSocket and StompJS. Presence system with automatic join/leave notifications. Event-driven architecture for scalability. Challenge: Handling multi-user concurrency. Lesson: WebSocket protocols vs traditional polling.

4.description: Smart autocomplete with Timer and JPopupMenu. Duplicate prevention using queries with TRIM() and UPPER(). Sophisticated owner-pet relationship management with DAO and Observer patterns. Challenge: Edge cases in ownership changes. Lesson: Importance of robust validation and intuitive UX.

5.period: Java 17 · Spring Boot 3.5 · Spring Security · MySQL
5.description: Hexagonal Architecture (Ports & Adapters) with DDD. Implemented immutable Value Objects (ClienteId, CuentaId, Dinero, Moneda), JWT authentication, rate limiting with Bucket4j, PDF statement generation with OpenPDF, and multi-currency support with exchange rates. Swagger/OpenAPI for documentation. Challenge: Modeling complex banking domain with strict business rules. Lesson: Value of DDD for complex domains.
